page.title: 09THE WELLCOME FOUNDATION 1
page.content: In 1880,two American pharmacists Silas Burroughs and Henry Wellcome established research laboratories. Giving his sientists freedom of investigation in the whole field of experimental therapeutics.The wellcome foundation limited was established by SIR Henry in 1924 under his sole ownership.When he deied ownership passed to the wellcome trust ,a registered charity which distributes the profits it receives for the support of medical, and allied research.The wellcome trust has now become the only chariable trust of its kind in the U.K,and to date has allocated Â£46 million grants for the furtherance of medical research in hospitals and universites around the world.
